Update dependencies from https://github.com/dotnet/arcade build 20241011.1

nodes.body: @rainersigwald , could you please tell us if it's ok to pull from latest channel here? (.net 10)
No, we should be on Arcade 9 until MSBuild is in the release that will ship with .NET 10.
